text: Buet keubajikan kon meutahadap Timu ngon barat muka taarah Teutapi teuma nyang keubajikan Beu tameuiman keu sidroe Allah Lom tameuiman uroe akhirat Keu malaikat ngon kitab Allah Meunan pih Nabi Rasul Hadharat Areuta meuhat lom bek takeubah Areuta nyang got nyang galak teuh that Beu tajok ligat keu ureueng susah Aneuk yatim ngon kawom keurabat Ureueng gasien that pih tajok bagah Ureueng meudagang ureueng meulakee Meunan lom teuntee namiet rap leupah Pubuet seumbahyang tabri ngon zakeut Janji meubacut bek na taubah Lom pih tasaba watee susah that Watee meularat pih bek tagundah Watee teuka prang pih bek teumakot Nyan keuh nyang patot ureueng meutuah Ureueng nyang beuna buet deungon haba Ureueng takwa keupada Allah
